faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Frequently asked questions and helpful resources

submitDocuments.question: How do I submit compliance documents?
submitDocuments.answer: Navigate to the Submissions page and follow the step-by-step process to upload your required documents. You can access this through the left navigation menu.

fileFormats.question: What file formats are accepted?
fileFormats.answer: We accept PDF file formats. Maximum file size is 90MB per document. Please ensure your documents are clearly readable and properly formatted.

trackStatus.question: How can I track my submission status?
trackStatus.answer: Visit the Submissions page to view the current status of all your submitted documents and any required actions. You'll see real-time updates on processing status.

recoveryPlan.question: What is a Technology Recovery Plan?
recoveryPlan.answer: A Technology Recovery Plan is a comprehensive document that outlines procedures and strategies for restoring technology operations following a disruption or disaster. It includes detailed steps for data recovery, system restoration, and business continuity to ensure minimal downtime and data loss.

planInstructions.question: What if an agency's Technology Recovery Plan does not follow the instructions?
planInstructions.answer: If an agency's Technology Recovery Plan does not follow the established instructions, the plan may be rejected or require revision. Agencies should review the official guidelines carefully and ensure all required components are included. Contact support for assistance in bringing your plan into compliance with current standards.

designationLetter.question: Are agencies required to submit the Designation Letter by January 31st?
designationLetter.answer: Yes, agencies are required to submit the Designation Letter by January 31st of each year, regardless of whether there are changes to the designated personnel. Additionally, if there are any changes to the designated personnel during the year, an updated Designation Letter must be submitted within 30 days of the change.

help.title: Need Additional Help?
help.description: If you can't find the answer to your question here, our support team is ready to assist you with any compliance-related inquiries.
